attacks.name: Power Recharge
attacks.effect: Put all Electropower cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Impact Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electrical GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 7 Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
